00002 /*! return a transposed row vector */
00003 inline drovector t(const _dcovector& covec)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005   _drovector rovec;
00006   rovec.l =covec.l;
00007   rovec.cap =covec.cap;
00008   delete [] rovec.array;
00009   rovec.array =covec.array;
00010 
00011   covec.nullify();
00012   return rovec;
00013 }

00016 /*! return its Euclidean norm */
00017 inline double nrm2(const _dcovector& vec)
00018 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00019   double val( dnrm2_(vec.l, vec.array, 1) );
00020   vec.destroy();
00021   return val;
00022 }
